data.name: The Black Gobbo

playerProfiles.name: The Black Gobbo
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Bombardier, Disturbing Presence, Dodge, Loner (3+), Side Step, Sneaky Git, Stab, Stunty

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Badlands Brawl' or 'Underworld Challenge' special rules.
data.specialRules: Sneakiest of the Lot: If your team includes the Black Gobbo, you may commit two Foul actions per team turn, provided one of your Foul actions is committed by the Black Gobbo himself.

data.name: Deeproot Strongbranch

playerProfiles.name: Deeproot Strongbranch
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+2), Stand Firm, Strong Arm, Thick Skull, Throw Team-mate, Timmm-ber!

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup' or 'Old World Classic' special rules.
data.specialRules: Reliable: If Deeproot fumbles a Throw Team-mate action, the player that was to be thrown will bounce as normal but will automatically land safely.

data.name: Eldril Sidewinder

playerProfiles.name: Eldril Sidewinder
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Catch, Dodge, Hypnotic Gaze, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, On the Ball

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Elven Kingdoms League' special rule.
data.specialRules: Mesmerizing Dance: Once per game, Eldril may re-roll a failed Agility test when attempting to use the Hypnotic Gaze trait.

data.name: Glart Smashrip

playerProfiles.name: Glart Smashrip
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Claw, Grab, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Stand Firm

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Favoured Of...' or 'Underworld Challenge' special rules.
data.specialRules: Frenzied Rush: Once per game, when Glart performs a Blitz action, he may gain the Frenzy skill. You must declare this special rule is being used when Glart is activated. Glart may not use the Grab skill during a turn in which he uses this special rule.

data.name: Gloriel Summerbloom

playerProfiles.name: Gloriel Summerbloom
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Accurate, Dodge, Loner (3+), Pass, Side Step, Sure Hands

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Elven Kingdoms League' special rule.
data.specialRules: Shot to Nothing: Once per game, when Gloriel performs a Pass action, she may gain the Hail Mary Pass skill. You must declare this special rule is being used when Gloriel is activated.

data.name: Grak and Crumbleberry

playerProfiles.name: Grak
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Bone Head, Kick Team-mate, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1), Thick Skull

playerProfiles.name: Crumbleberry
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Dodge, Loner (4+), Right Stuff, Stunty, Sure Hands

data.playsFor: Any team.
data.specialRules: Two for One: Grak and Crumbleberry must be hired as a pair and count as two Star Players. However, if either Grak or Crumbleberry is removed from play due to suffering a KO’d or Casualty! result on the Injury table, the other replaces the Loner (4+) trait with the Loner (2+) trait.

data.name: Gretchen Wächter ‘The Blood Bowl Widow’

playerProfiles.name: Gretchen Wächter ‘The Blood Bowl Widow’
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Disturbing Presence, Dodge, Foul Appearance, Jump Up, Loner (4+), No Hands, Regeneration, Shadowing, Side Step

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Sylvanian Spotlight' special rule.
data.specialRules: Incorporeal: Once per game, after making an Agility test to dodge, Gretchen may choose to modify the dice roll by adding her Strength characteristic to it.

data.name: Griff Oberwald

playerProfiles.name: Griff Oberwald
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Dodge, Fend, Loner (3+), Sprint, Sure Feet

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup' or 'Old World Classic' special rules.
data.specialRules: Consummate Professional: Once per game, Griff may re-roll one dice that was rolled either as a single dice roll, as part of a multiple dice roll or as part of a dice pool (this cannot be a dice that was rolled as part of an Armour, Injury or Casualty roll).

data.name: Grim Ironjaw

playerProfiles.name: Grim Ironjaw
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Dauntless, Frenzy, Loner (4+), Multiple Block, Thick Skull

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup', 'Old World Classic' or 'Worlds Edge Superleague' special rules.
data.specialRules: Slayer: Once per game, when an opposition player with a Strength characteristic of 5 or more is Knocked Down as the result of a Block action performed by Grim, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to either the Armour roll or Injury roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

data.name: Hakflem Skuttlespike

playerProfiles.name: Hakflem Skuttlespike
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Dodge, Extra Arms, Loner (4+), Prehensile Tail, Two Heads

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Favoured Of...' or 'Underworld Challenge' special rules.
data.specialRules: Treacherous: Once per game, if a team-mate in an adjacent square to Hakflem is in possession of the ball when Hakflem is activated, that player may immediately be Knocked Down and Hakflem may take possession of the ball. No Turnover is caused as a result of using this special rule.

data.name: Helmut Wulf

playerProfiles.name: Helmut Wulf
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Chainsaw, Loner (4+), Pro, Secret Weapon, Stand Firm

data.playsFor: Any team.
data.specialRules: Old Pro: Once per game, Helmut may use his Pro skill to re-roll a single dice rolled as part of an Armour roll.

data.name: Karla Von Kill

playerProfiles.name: Karla Von Kill
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Dauntless, Dodge, Jump Up, Loner (4+)

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup', 'Lustrian Superleague' or 'Old World Classic' special rules.
data.specialRules: Indomitable: Once per game, when Karla successfully rolls to use her Dauntless skill, she may increase her Strength characteristic to double that of the nominated target of her Block action.

data.name: Lord Borak the Despoiler

playerProfiles.name: Lord Borak the Despoiler
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Dirty Player (+2), Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1), Sneaky Git

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Favoured of…' special rule.
data.specialRules: Lord of Chaos: A team that includes Lord Borak gains an extra Team re-roll for the first half of the game. If this Team re-roll is not used during the first half, it may be carried over into the second half. However, if Lord Borak is removed from play before this re-roll is used, it is lost.

data.name: Mighty Zug

playerProfiles.name: Mighty Zug
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1)

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup', 'Lustrian Superleague' or 'Old World Classic' special rules.
data.specialRules: Crushing Blow: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as the result of a Block action performed by Zug, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Armour roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

data.name: Morg ‘n’ Thorg

playerProfiles.name: Morg ‘n’ Thorg
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+2), Thick Skull, Throw Team-mate

data.playsFor: Any team except those that have the 'Sylvanian Spotlight' special rule.
data.specialRules: The Ballista: Once per game, if Morg fails the Passing Ability test when making a Pass action or a Throw Team-mate action, you may re-roll the D6.

data.name: Roxanna Darknail

playerProfiles.name: Roxanna Darknail
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Dodge, Frenzy, Jump Up, Juggernaut, Leap, Loner (4+)

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Elven Kingdoms League' special rule.
data.specialRules: Burst of Speed: Once per game, Roxanna may attempt to Rush three times, rather than the usual two. You may declare you are using this special rule after Roxanna has Rushed twice.

data.name: Rumbelow Sheepskin

playerProfiles.name: Rumbelow Sheepskin
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Horns, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), No Hands, Tackle, Thick Skull

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup', 'Old World Classic' or 'Worlds Edge Superleague' special rules.
data.specialRules: Ram: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as the result of a Block action performed by Rumbelow, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to either the Armour roll or Injury roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

data.name: Skrull Halfheight

playerProfiles.name: Skrull Halfheight
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Accurate, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, Pass, Regeneration, Sure Hands, Thick Skull

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Sylvanian Spotlight' or 'Worlds Edge Superleague' special rules.
data.specialRules: Strong Passing Game: Once per game, after making a Passing Ability test to perform a Pass action, Skrull may choose to modify the dice roll by adding his Strength characteristic to it.

data.name: The Swift Twins

playerProfiles.name: Lucien Swift
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1), Tackle

playerProfiles.name: Valen Swift
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Accurate, Loner (4+), Nerves of Steel, Pass, Safe Pass, Sure Hands

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Elven Kingdoms League' special rule.
data.specialRules: Two for One: The Swift Twins must be hired as a pair and count as two Star Players. However, if either Lucien or Valen is removed from play due to suffering a KO’d or Casualty! result on the Injury table, the other replaces the Loner (4+) trait with the Loner (2+) trait.

data.name: Varag Ghoul-Chewer

playerProfiles.name: Varag Ghoul-Chewer
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Jump Up, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1), Thick Skull

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Badlands Brawl' or 'Underworld Challenge' special rules.
data.specialRules: Crushing Blow: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as the result of a Block action performed by Varag, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Armour roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

data.name: Grombrindal, the White Dwarf

playerProfiles.name: Grombrindal, the White Dwarf
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Block, Dauntless, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1), Stand Firm, Thick Skull

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Halfling Thimble Cup', 'Lustrian Superleague', 'Old World Classic' or 'Worlds Edge Superleague' special rules.
data.specialRules: Wisdom of the White Dwarf: Once per team turn, when one of Grombrindal’s team-mates that is in an adjacent square is activated, that player gains either the Break Tackle, Dauntless, Mighty Blow (+1) or Sure Feet skill until the end of their activation.

data.name: Willow Rosebark

playerProfiles.name: Willow Rosebark
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Dauntless, Loner (4+), Side Step, Thick Skull

data.playsFor: Any team with the 'Elven Kingdoms League' special rule.
data.specialRules: Indomitable: Once per game, when Willow successfully rolls to use her Dauntless skill, she may increase her Strength characteristic to double that of the nominated target of her Block action.

data.name: Zolcath the Zoat

playerProfiles.name: Zolcath the Zoat
playerProfiles.skillsAndTraits: Disturbing Presence, Juggernaut, Loner (4+), Mighty Blow (+1), Prehensile Tail, Regeneration, Sure Feet

data.playsFor: Any team with either the 'Lustrian Superleague' or 'Elven Kingdoms League' special rules.
data.specialRules: “Excuse Me, Are You a Zoat?”: Once per game, when Zolcath is activated, he may gain the Hypnotic Gaze trait. You must declare this special rule is being used when Zolcath is activated.
